get.description: This API fetches the details of the TimeTrack Settings configured in your helpdesk.

put.description: This API updates an existing TimeTracking configuration.

post.description: This API adds a TimeTracking configuration to your helpdesk.

get.summary: List history details of billing TimeTrack Settings
get.description: This API fetches the history of changes made to the billing preferences in time tracking settings. The different events supported are @BILLING_PREFERENCE_ENABLED@, @BILLING_PREFERENCE_DISABLED@, @BILLING_TYPE_SELECTED@, @BILLING_TYPE_CHANGED@, @FIXED_COST_ENTERED@, @FIXED_COST_EDITED@, @AGENT_ADDED@, @AGENT_COST_EDITED@, @AGENT_DELETED@, @PROFILE_ADDED@, @PROFILE_COST_EDITED@, and @PROFILE_DELETED@.

billingType.description: Type of billing configured. Values supported are @FIXED_COST_FOR_TICKETS@ @FIXED_COST_FOR_AGENTS@ @SPECIFIC_COST_PER_AGENT@ and @SPECIFIC_COST_PER_PROFILE@

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Cost fixed for either billing category - by ticket or by agent.
ID of the department in which time tracking must be enabled or disabled.

Time tracking refers to the process of recording the time agents take to resolve tickets. This information can be recorded manually or automatically, based on your organization's requirement and preference. APIs related to this endpoint help you configure the settings for automated time tracking.
Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

fieldUpdate.description: Whether to create timeentry when upaating field in a ticket in auto track mode

onRemoteAssist.description: Whether to create timeentry for remote assist in a ticket in auto track mode. This is applicable only for assist integrated portals

onChatComplete.description: Whether to create timeentry when closing a chat for a ticket in auto track mode

commentActions.description: Whether to create timeentry when commenting in a ticket in auto track mode

approvalActions.description: Whether to create timeentry while create, edit, delete approvals in a ticket in auto track mode

sendReply.description: Whether to create timeentry when replying in a ticket in auto track mode

manualDraft.description: Whether to create timeentry when saving draft manually in a ticket in auto track mode

resolutionActions.description: Whether to create timeentry when create, edit, delete resolution in a ticket in auto track mode

attachmentActions.description: Whether to create timeentry while create, edit, delete attachments in a ticket in auto track mode

isReviewTime.description: Type of track preference (either Manual  Automatic)

isAutoPause.description: Type of track preference (either Manual  Automatic)

isHideTimeTracking.description: Type of track preference (either Manual  Automatic)

isAutoTimer.description: Type of track preference (either Manual  Automatic)

billingType.description: Type of billing configured. Values supported are @FIXED_COST_FOR_TICKETS@ @FIXED_COST_FOR_AGENTS@ @SPECIFIC_COST_PER_AGENT@ and @SPECIFIC_COST_PER_PROFILE@

isTasksEnabled.description: To enable time tracking for tasks in manual mode

isEventsEnabled.description: To enable time tracking for events in manual mode

canAutoTrackCalls.description: To enable time tracking for calls in auto mode

trackMode.description: Track Mode for activity. Supported values arw @CONSECUTIVE@ @CONCURRENT@

fixedCost.description: Cost fixed for either billing category - by ticket or by agent.

depId.description: ID of the department in which time tracking must be enabled or disabled.

isTimeTracking.description: Time tracking refers to the process of recording the time agents take to resolve tickets. This information can be recorded manually or automatically, based on your organization's requirement and preference. APIs related to this endpoint help you configure the settings for automated time tracking.

isBillable.description: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.
